content:
AspNetCompiler Class

Definition

Implements the AspNetCompiler task. Use the AspNetCompiler element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see AspNetCompiler Task.

In this Article

public class AspNetCompiler : Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension
Inheritance
Object
Task
ToolTask
Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension
AspNetCompiler

Constructors

AspNetCompiler()

Initializes a new instance of the AspNetCompiler class.

public AspNetCompiler ();

Properties

AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute, which allows partially trusted callers access to an assembly, should be applied to the strongly named assembly that Aspnet_compiler.exe generates.

public bool AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the AllowPartiallyTrustedCallersAttribute should be applied to the strongly named assembly that Aspnet_compiler.exe generates; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This property must be combined with the KeyFile or KeyContainer properties.

Clean

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the precompiled application will be built clean.

public bool Clean { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the precompiled application will be built clean; otherwise, false.

Remarks

If this property is true, any previously compiled components will be recompiled. The default value is false.

Debug

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether debug information (.PDB file) is emitted during compilation.

public bool Debug { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the debug information (.PDB file) is emitted during compilation; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The default value is false.

DelaySign

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the AssemblyDelaySignAttribute, which indicates that an assembly should be signed only with the public key token rather than with the public/private key pair, should be applied to the generated assembly.

public bool DelaySign { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the AssemblyDelaySignAttribute should be applied to the generated assembly; otherwise, false.

FixedNames

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether one assembly should be generated for each page in the application.

public bool FixedNames { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if one assembly should be generated for each page in the application; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Each assembly is named with the virtual path of the original page unless the name would exceed the operating system limit for file names, in which case a hash is generated and used for the assembly name.

You cannot use this property for in-place compilation; in-place compilation honors configuration settings for compilation batch mode.

Force

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether existing files in the targetDir directory and its subdirectories should be overwritten.

public bool Force { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if existing files in the targetDir directory and its subdirectories should be overwritten; otherwise, false.

KeyContainer

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the AssemblyKeyNameAttribute, which indicates the name of the container for the public/private key pair that is used to generate a strong name, should be applied to the compiled assembly.

public string KeyContainer { get; set; }
Value
String

true if the AssemblyKeyNameAttribute should be applied to the compiled assembly; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This property must be combined with AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers property.

KeyFile

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the AssemblyKeyFileAttribute, which indicates the name of the file containing the public/private key pair that is used to generate a strong name, should be applied to the compiled assembly.

public string KeyFile { get; set; }
Value
String

true if the AssemblyKeyFileAttribute should be applied to the compiled assembly; otherwise, false.

Remarks

This property must be combined with AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers property.

MetabasePath

Gets or sets the full IIS metabase path of the application.

public string MetabasePath { get; set; }
Value
String

The full IIS metabase path of the application.

PhysicalPath

Gets or sets the physical path of the application to be compiled.

public string PhysicalPath { get; set; }
Value
String

The physical path of the application to be compiled.

Remarks

If this property is missing, the IIS metabase is used to locate the application.

TargetFrameworkMoniker

Gets or sets the TargetFrameworkMoniker indicating which .NET Framework version of aspnet_compiler.exe should be used.

public string TargetFrameworkMoniker { get; set; }
Value
String

Returns the TargetFrameworkMoniker.

Remarks

Only accepts .NET Framework monikers.

TargetPath

Gets or sets the physical path to which the application is compiled.

public string TargetPath { get; set; }
Value
String

The physical path to which the application is compiled.

Remarks

If not specified, the application is precompiled in-place.

ToolName

Gets the name of the AspNetCompiler tool (aspnet_compiler.exe).

protected override string ToolName { get; }
Value
String

The name of the AspNetCompiler tool.

Updateable

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the precompiled application will be updateable.

public bool Updateable { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the precompiled application will be updateable; otherwise, false.

Remarks

The default value is false.

VirtualPath

Gets or sets the virtual path of the application to be compiled.

public string VirtualPath { get; set; }
Value
String

The virtual path of the application to be compiled.

Remarks

If PhysicalPath specified, the physical path is used to locate the application. Otherwise, the IIS metabase is used, and the application is assumed to be in the default site.

Methods

AddCommandLineCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

Generates command line arguments for the AspNetCompiler tool.

protected override void AddCommandLineCommands (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine);
commandLine
CommandLineBuilderExtension

Command line builder to add arguments to.

Execute()

Executes the AspNetCompiler task.

public override bool Execute ();
Returns
Boolean

true if task execution succeeded; otherwise, false.

GenerateFullPathToTool()

Returns the full file path of the AspNetCompiler tool.

protected override string GenerateFullPathToTool ();
Returns
String

The full file path of the AspNetCompiler tool.

ValidateParameters()

Validates input parameters and logs errors or warnings, if any. Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether task execution should proceed.

protected override bool ValidateParameters ();
Returns
Boolean

true if task execution should proceed; otherwise, false.
